channel.title: Comments on: Green Banana Flour Chocolate Chip Cookies (Gluten-Free & Top 8 Free)

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/banana-flour-chocolate-chip-cookies/#comment-376">Kathleen</a>.
Thank you for your review! So happy to hear you enjoyed the recipe.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Kathleen.

Thank you for your review! So happy to hear you enjoyed the recipe.

item.title: By: Kathleen
item.dc:creator: Kathleen
item.description: These are delicious and just the right amount of sweet (even with 100% chocolate chips)! I used Califia farms refrigerated coconut milk since that was all I had, and they turned out fine.
item.content:encoded: These are delicious and just the right amount of sweet (even with 100% chocolate chips)! I used Califia farms refrigerated coconut milk since that was all I had, and they turned out fine.

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/banana-flour-chocolate-chip-cookies/#comment-369">Katerina</a>.
Thank you for taking the time to leave a review! I am thrilled that you love the cookie recipe. I love the idea of pre-mixing the dry ingredients for travel!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Katerina.

Thank you for taking the time to leave a review! I am thrilled that you love the cookie recipe. I love the idea of pre-mixing the dry ingredients for travel!

item.title: By: Katerina
item.dc:creator: Katerina
item.description:
THE BEST AIP COOKIES!!! I made these just before lent and then decided to give up baked goods since I can’t give up meat on AIP. I haven’t stopped thinking about them since! Easter is next week and this is what I’m looking forward to!
I try to stay away from coconut milk, so used avocado oil in its place and they were great!
I’m taking a long trip and plan to premeasure dry ingredients in ziplocks for a convenient cookie mix.
item.content:encoded:
THE BEST AIP COOKIES!!! I made these just before lent and then decided to give up baked goods since I can’t give up meat on AIP. I haven’t stopped thinking about them since! Easter is next week and this is what I’m looking forward to!

I try to stay away from coconut milk, so used avocado oil in its place and they were great!

I’m taking a long trip and plan to premeasure dry ingredients in ziplocks for a convenient cookie mix.
